titles.title: Tax Free Road Home Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the exclusion from gross income for amounts paid to individuals pursuant to the Road Home program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H7767)

bill.summary:
3/9/2007--Introduced.
Tax Free Road Home Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income payments to individual taxpayers from the Louisiana Road Home program for rebuilding or renewing a personal residence.
